estuary.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • estuary.model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable, GameFunctionality, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FinalScreen, MainMenu, ModelCountingGame, ModelMazeGame, ModelShoreGame

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tickable, GameFunctionality, java.io.Serializable
    Game is an abstract class that implements Tickable and GameFunctionality All games extend Game to make sure that they contain all necessary methods
    Author:
    Sean Rajkowski, Gregory Palmer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
